company_context: Snyk AI Security Fabric | Secure Code, Models & Agents | Snyk You need to enable JavaScript to run this app. Skip to main content This Just In: Snyk "ToxicSkills" Research Exposes Critical Flaws in ClawHub & OpenClaw Introducing the AI Security Fabric Unleash AI Innovators Securely A new autonomous defense architecture designed for an era where code creation has accelerated beyond human capacity. Weave an invisible, intelligent layer of defense into every creation. Explore the platform Play Video: Snyk AI Security Fabric You're shipping risk at record speeds AI-driven development has put code velocity into overdrive, but 48% of AI-gen code is insecure. Speed without security means insecure code is being introduced faster than ever before. Attackers are accelerating Time-to-exploit (TTE) is shrinking fast. AI-enabled attackers are exploiting vulnerabilities across traditional and emerging attack surfaces, and TTE is expected to accelerate by 50% by 2027. Your AI features are now attack vectors AI-native components are being embedded into applications everywhere. Pair that with existing vulnerabilities, and attackers can exploit the access and power of AI itself — compounding risk in ways we've never seen. The Snyk AI Security Platform Snyk’s AI-native and agentic platform helps organizations secure and govern development to unleash productivity, reduce business risk, and accelerate software delivery for the age of AI. Learn More 288% ROI from improved productivity, improved risk posture, and cost savings on consolidated solutions with Snyk 80% Faster scan time than solutions used prior to Snyk 75% Faster remediation for issues prevented upstream in development with Snyk 60% Faster remediation for issues found in runtime with Snyk compared to prior solutions 3 AppSec solutions that were redundant with Snyk, that customers consolidated onto Snyk’s platform 52% Reduced risk of a data breach with Snyk compared to prior solutions Your browser does not support the video tag. Snyk is trusted by the world’s most innovative companies. Named a leader by analysts & customers Why customers trust Snyk Yalo Okta Seismic Komatsu Revolut Skechers Play Video “Every company is moving toward AI, and security has to move with it. Snyk is ready to support our AI initiatives by protecting us as we adopt and experiment with AI. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm a Sales Development Representative at DeepData AI. I came across your company and was impressed with the work you're doing in the AI space. I'd love to introduce you to our data processing solution that can help you optimize your AI workflows.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, thanks for reaching out, Alex. I'm John, the CTO here. We're always looking for ways to improve our AI capabilities, but I have to say, we've already invested heavily in a competing solution from Snyk. What makes DeepData AI different?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question, John. While Snyk is a well-established player, our solution offers more advanced data processing capabilities and better integration with popular AI frameworks. We've seen our customers achieve significant performance gains and cost savings by switching to DeepData AI.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I see. Well, we did just sign a three-year contract with Snyk, so I'm not sure we're in a position to switch vendors right now. Plus, I'm not convinced that the benefits of DeepData AI would outweigh the costs of migrating our existing workflows. Can you speak to the ROI we could expect from your solution?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely. We've had customers see returns of up to 30% on their investment in DeepData AI, primarily through reduced data processing times and improved model accuracy. However, I understand that migrating from an existing solution can be a significant undertaking. We do offer support and resources to help with the transition, though.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate that, but I'm still concerned about the timing. We're in the middle of a major AI development project, and I don't want to introduce any new variables that could disrupt our progress. And to be honest, I'm not sure our team has the bandwidth to take on a new vendor right now.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your concerns, John. Perhaps we could discuss a pilot project or a proof-of-concept to demonstrate the value of DeepData AI in a low-risk setting? This would allow you to evaluate our solution without disrupting your current workflows.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, Alex, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. Our contract with Snyk runs for another two and a half years, and we need to see that investment through. I appreciate your understanding, and I wish you the best of luck with your sales efforts.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have more aggressively addressed the buyer's concerns about timing and migration costs earlier in the conversation to potentially overcome the objection. Sentiment: Neutral
